properties.entry: SELECT PNO , TITLE , REGION , AGE , AREA , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(S_DATE, 'RRRRMMDD'), 'RRRR.MM.DD') S_DATE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(E_DATE, 'RRRRMMDD'), 'RRRR.MM.DD') E_DATE , TIME , MAIN_IMG , DETAIL_IMG , ETC FROM PRODUCT WHERE A_PRICE = 0 AND SOLDOUT = 'N'

SELECT PNO , TITLE , REGION , AGE , AREA , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(S_DATE, 'RRRRMMDD'), 'RRRR.MM.DD') S_DATE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(E_DATE, 'RRRRMMDD'), 'RRRR.MM.DD') E_DATE , TIME , MAIN_IMG , DETAIL_IMG , ETC FROM PRODUCT WHERE SUBSTR(S_DATE, 5, 2) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM') AND SOLDOUT = 'N' ORDER BY TITLE
